text: Can we apply password protection to blogs in any way?

Password protected pages are only available for website or landing pages depending on your subscription. 

You can create membership access for blogs, it's the same as private content for other pages: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/require-member-registration-to-access-private-content|https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/require-member-registration-to-access-private-content>
